title: Goal Keeper
description: A goal tracking application with progress visualization and milestone management. Built to help users set, track, and achieve their personal and professional goals.
documentation:
# Goal Keeper

## Overview
Goal Keeper is a comprehensive goal tracking application designed to help users manage their objectives effectively.

## Features
- **Goal Creation**: Set SMART goals with deadlines
- **Progress Tracking**: Visual progress bars and charts
- **Milestone Management**: Break down goals into achievable milestones
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Track your success rate over time

## AI Development Process
This application was built using AI pair programming:
1. Initial concept and requirements were discussed with Claude 3
2. Component architecture was designed collaboratively
3. GitHub Copilot assisted with boilerplate code
4. Complex logic was refined through iterative AI consultation

## Technical Implementation
- State management using React hooks
- Local storage for data persistence
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Chart.js for data visualization
